overview.heading: Denver Virtual Office
overview.body: Snag a premium business address in Denver without breaking the bank on a physical workspace. With Opus VO, you can establish your business right where the Denver action is, all while keeping your budget in check. For those high-stakes meetings or client rendezvous, our cutting-edge conference rooms are ready and waiting. And let’s not forget, a Denver address is a solid gold stamp on your brand’s reputation.  When you opt for a virtual setting in Denver through Opus VO, a live receptionist comes as part of the package. We’re geared towards making every client touchpoint harmonize with your specific business goals. Hand over the day-to-day admin tasks to us, leaving you free to pursue your business aspirations.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Denver, Colorado even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Denver. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Colorado.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Denver virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Denver?
sections.body: Denver isn’t just about that mile-high lifestyle; it’s a bustling economic hub with opportunities in tech, energy, and tourism. Our Denver locations are strategically positioned to offer you immediate access to vital industry players and enriching networking events.  By choosing Opus VO in Denver, you’re doing more than economizing on overhead—you’re gaining an invaluable leg up on your competitors. Eager to elevate your business? Our first-class virtual offices are here to support you in reaching new heights.  Choose from two Opus VO locations in Denver @ 7887 East Belleview Avenue, Denver, CO 80111, or 8400 E Prentice Avenue (Greenwood Village), Denver, CO 80111
